entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 09:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Snow at times heavy inland. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Snowfall amount 25 cm inland. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
